channel.title: Drops help
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I'm making a server and I can't seem to figure out how to make drops only need one click to pick them up. At the moment, it takes 2-4 clicks to pick up one thing and it's kind of annoying. ha ha
If there is already a tutorial on this or some place this is answered please link me to it, I tried searching for a tutorial, but couldn't seem to find one.
EDIT: The server is 317 based if that matters. I know there is a way to do it on 317, but like I said, I just can't seem to find out how.
Thank you ahead of time!!

item.title: Drops help
item.dc:creator: @RemmyHero RemmyHero
item.description:
@RemmyHero wrote:

[quote=“Pure Demons, post:2, topic:326310”][quote author=RemmyHero link=topic=422724.msg3103113#msg3103113 date=1263858519]
Hey everyone, I’m making a server and I can’t seem to figure out how to make drops only need one click to pick them up. At the moment, it takes 2-4 clicks to pick up one thing and it’s kind of annoying. ha ha

If there is already a tutorial on this or some place this is answered please link me to it, I tried searching for a tutorial, but couldn’t seem to find one.

EDIT: The server is 317 based if that matters. I know there is a way to do it on 317, but like I said, I just can’t seem to find out how.

Thank you ahead of time!!
[/quote]

Remmmyyy! I’m Matt for City of Nitro. o…o Idk how though, sorry.[/quote]

Hey Matt, talk to me on IRC.

I still need help with this! Please, someone help me!

Read full topic
